title: LivBox Site
features: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Twitter Bootstrap, jQuery, Laravel 4 and MySql
resume: LivBox is a file manager. Was created based on the need to manage files using a local network, where each user has an account, can store files, create folders and share files with other users of the system, all with the minimum possible setting. The LivBox is designed to be optimized for local networks, but functions normally in open networks like the Internet.
